text: Ceorles wergild is on Myrcna lage CC scillinga.
Ðegnes wergild is syx swa micel, þæt bið twelf hund scillinga.
Ðonne bið cynges anfeald wergild six þegna wer be Myrcna laga, þæt is XXX þusend sceatta, & þæt bið ealles CXX punda.
Swa micel is þæs wergildes on folces folcriht be Myrcna laga.
& for ðam cynedome gebireð oðer swilc to bote on cynegilde.
Se wer gebirað magum & seo cynebot þam leodum.
